IF EXISTS (SELECT LoanGuid FROM app.TextOptIn 
WHERE LoanGuid = '[Get:LG]' and CellPhone = '[Get:CCP]' )
BEGIN
select OptIn,

CASE
When DateSent IS NULL or DateSent = '' Then N'Send Opt In ➜'
When DateSent <> '' and OptIn IS NULL or OptIn = '' Then N'Re-Send Opt In ⌛'
When DateSent <> '' and OptIn = 'yes' Then N'Opted In ✔'
When DateSent <> '' and OptIn = 'stop' Then N'⤬ Opted Out ⤬'

END AS Words
from app.TextOptIn
where LoanGuid = '[Get:LG]' and CellPhone = '[Get:CCP]' and CompanyId = '[Get:CID]'

END
ELSE
BEGIN

select N'Send Opt In ➜' AS Words
END
